description: Seven people were taken to Grady Memorial Hospital with non-life-threatening injuries after a Tuesday morning wreck involving a MARTA bus and a dump truck.
title: 7 people injured in wreck involving MARTA bus, dump truck
title_page: 7 people injured in wreck involving MARTA bus, dump truck
text:
Seven people were taken to Grady Memorial Hospital with non-life-threatening injuries after a Tuesday morning wreck involving a MARTA bus and a dump truck.
The crash happened just before 9 a.m. at the intersection of Perry Boulevard and Marietta Road in northwest Atlanta.
“The dump truck rear ended the bus,” MARTA spokeswoman Alisa Jackson told The Atlanta Journal-Constitution in an emailed statement.
A bus operator and an operator candidate were among the seven people taken to Grady, Jackson said.
